name: Lost Forest (senvid)
description:
A girl lost in the forest gets the help of the forest elves and escapes the forest using various magic seeds given to her by the elves. The magic seeds can grow various plants. For example, vines growing at the top of the cave allow the girl to reach higher or further by swinging, mushrooms on the ground can bounce the girl up, and ivy on the walls allows her to climb the walls. In addition seeds can also parasitize monsters, the parasitized monsters can not move. And the girl can step on it and jump higher.

The game does not contain English instructions, but the Read_Me.txt file in the download file contains English instructions.

I am a student and this is my first attempt at developing a game, which took a total of four months.If there is any part in the game that you're not satisified with, please let me know and I'll do my best to improve it .
